name: Reelistic Fishing
description:
Go fishing in a tropical environment. Catch as much fish as you can to move between each stop!

Play creative minigames to catch 8 unique fish as you aim to be the best fisherman possible. 

Fish AI: Reelistic fishing is powered by a new fish AI system that allows the fish to live in the world realistically and react accordingly to the players actions.

Beautiful world: Go fishing in a beautiful tropical world with unique aspects at both day and night!
